contentSections.heading: Events Tailwind
contentSections.blurb: Music has a wonderful ability to inspire people. It forms a common connection and brings us together to enjoy performances by wonderful musicians.
contentSections.body: Bringing top musicians to our city, Events Tailwind is committed to creating opportunities for locals and visitors to experience the very best of the world's musicians.

contentSections.quote: The Events Tailwind was formed to present concerts and other entertainment for our local community. Our aim is to support our arts culture by promoting the enjoyment and encouragement of the performing arts.

data.title: Jazz Jams
data.body: Jazz Jams are for all our die-hard jazz fans wanting to experience the best jazz our city has to offer! We have local jazz duos and bands, some up-and-coming and some renowned, playing once a month. Check out our event page on Facebook to see our drinks and deals available that day.
data.description: Experience the best jazz our city has to offer with local jazz duos and bands, some up-and-coming and some renowned.
data.bookingInfo: Booking information to be advised closer to the date.
data.quote: The best jazz our city has to offer

data.title: Rockerfella
data.body: After 16 years since their last recording, Rockerfella have returned to the recording studio with a bang! Releasing their first single which entered the chart at #60 the first time ever an unheard of song has ever been voted into the chart let alone enter so high! Followed up with the much anticipated Volume 1 release in the four part series in March Rockerfella are hitting the road in support of the release of Volume 1 in the 4 part volumes series this September and October.
data.description: Rockerfella are back touring the country, kicking it all off in the Garden City.
data.bookingInfo: Booking information to be advised closer to the date.
data.quote: Rockerfella have returned to the recording studio with a bang
